mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wedding Invitation of Pattie Howard to Walter S. Tipton
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
A simple wedding invitation that reads in typed cursive:
Your presence is requested at the marriage of Pattie Howard to Walter S. Tipton on Thursday evening, April fourteenth, at eight o' clock; by Dr. and Mrs. T.H. Howard at their home, Jacksonville, Virginia 1892.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Invitations
Marriage
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
